mapper.select: SELECT count(l.seq) AS total_count FROM `like` l JOIN `post` p ON l.post_seq = p.seq JOIN `user` u ON p.user_seq = u.seq WHERE l.user_seq = #{userSeq}
SELECT COUNT(to_user_seq) AS total_count FROM zzim z INNER JOIN user u ON z.to_user_seq = u.seq WHERE from_user_seq = #{userSeq} AND u.code = 'CUSTOMER'
SELECT COUNT(from_user_seq) AS total_count FROM zzim z INNER JOIN user u ON z.from_user_seq = u.seq WHERE to_user_seq = #{userSeq} AND u.code = 'STORE'
